main_definition: Permitted or given official approval to do something.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Given legal power or permission to act in a particular way, typically by someone with authority over an individual.
meanings_and_examples.example: Only authorized personnel can access the secure server room.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Endorsed or approved officially for use, such as documents, forms, or designs.
meanings_and_examples.example: The company requires all employees to have their ID cards authorized before using the building's facilities.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Allowed by a person in authority; permitted under certain conditions.
meanings_and_examples.example: Drivers are authorized to use their own vehicle for official business as long as it meets safety standards.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Empowered or legally allowed to perform an action, typically because of special qualifications or authority.
meanings_and_examples.example: Only authorized agents can sign contracts on behealf of the company.
